thread.section_title: Bandzoogle Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bandzoogle | bandzoogle.com
thread.title: Matt Buchanan

author: Matt Buchanan
title: Matt Buchanan
text: As a musician, I do not have alot of time to build websites and learn code and all of the complexities of building a web presence. That's where Bandzoogle comes in. Easy user interface, great customer service, kind staff and enough tutorials and resources to give you a great looking site plus the education on how to utilize it. Bandzoogle is hands down the single greatest web platform for artists on the web.
